attributes.action: We NEED a 2nd Referendum on BREXIT.
attributes.background:
We the people, NEED a final say!
By signing this petition we are asking our government to hear us out and give us a final say on Brexit.
The first time around nothing was clear,  many people who voted to leave the EU feel they have been mislead. 
Let us put it back to the people!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what question you would like to be asked in a 2nd EU referendum.

There are already several petitions calling for referenda of different types. You could sign one of these petitions if it calls for something you want to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition, or example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253709

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/263134

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253636

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272155
